Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (You shudder at the thought of even engaging in conversation with it.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (It seems like this thing is eager to share how things work around here, though.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Regardless... from what can be gathered here:)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Each day will have a different featured monster, the 'Soup of the Day'.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Performing well in battles will earn currency known as Valknuts.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (They are purely emblematic and symbolic of will.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (They might be useful down the line, however.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Talk to Hemlighet to prepare for battle. Talk to Vaktare to enter battle.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (After battle is time for the feast, where warriors can chat.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Also Hemlighet never mentioned it, but 'S' should be pressed.)

Speech.Name: Dorrvakt
Speech.Content: (Those assumptions really are more than meets the eye.)
